# library imports
from pyspark.sql import SparkSession
from pyspark.sql.types import *
from pyspark.sql.functions import *
from pyspark.sql.functions import udf
from pyspark.sql.utils import AnalysisException
from pyspark.sql import Row
import datetime
import ast
import re
import calendar
import pandas

customer_df = spark.read\
                .option("header", True)\
                .option("inferSchema", True)\
                .csv(csv_raw_path)
customer_df.createOrReplaceTempView("customer")


customer_json = spark.read\
                .option("header", True)\
                .option("inferSchema", True)\
                .json(json_raw_path)

# flattening schema
customer_flattened = flatten(customer_json.schema) 
flt_customer_df = customer_json.select(*customer_flattened)

# pyspark processig
getBirthYear = udf(lambda z: calc_birthyear(z))
generationBucketizer = udf(lambda z: bucketize(z,[18,23,39,55,64,199],["Children","GenerationZ","Millenials","GenX","BabyBoomer","Silent"]),StringType())
ageCategoryBucketizer = udf(lambda z: bucketize(z,[18,25,35,45,55,65,199],["0-18","19-25","26-35","36-45","46-55","56-65","66+"]),StringType())
socialStateBucketizer = udf(lambda z: bucketize(z,[250,500,750,999],["Poor","Wealthy","Mid Level Income","High Income"]),StringType())

 #sk_generator('customer_id','sk_customer','customer')\
customer_df = flt_customer_df\
.withColumn( 'birthYear', getBirthYear('age'))\
.withColumn( 'generation', generationBucketizer('age'))\
.withColumn( 'age_category', ageCategoryBucketizer('age'))\
.withColumn( 'ngFicoScore', flt_customer_df["ngFicoScore"].cast(IntegerType()))\
.withColumn( 'social_state', socialStateBucketizer('ngFicoScore'))

customer_df.createOrReplaceTempView("customer")
SELECT userId, age, generation FROM customer LIMIT 10
